title: Fix beam-text centering and beams performance in sysc-Go
description:
Fix beams performance in sysc-Go

beam-text is working as designed in sysc-Go. sysc-walls now uses Auto=true and centers the output in fullscreen (FIXED).

beams still needs optimization in sysc-Go:
- Currently creates width*height characters (12k+ on fullscreen)
- Causing severe performance issues
- Consider sparse sampling or only creating characters where beams are active
- Verify rendering across entire screen dimensions
